name: Henry GIBBS, Jr., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Board of Probation and Parole, Appellee

parties: Henry GIBBS, Jr., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Board of Probation and Parole, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of June, 2002, we AFFIRM the Order of the Commonwealth Court.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
798 A.2d 1275
Henry GIBBS, Jr., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Board of Probation and Parole, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 17, 2002.
